description:
Kobashiri Yae is a third year at Bansei High.
Yae first appears leaving a supermarket and wonders whats with the stunned look on her teammates faces. She then notices what they were looking at and tells them the one in the jersey might be a good opponent but it doesn`t matter because she`s been playing longer. During the individual tournament her match was briefly shown. Here she was quickly defeated by Matsumi Kuro.
Source: Saki Wikia
name: Kobashiri Yae
